description: ***NOTE*** Version 2 package name changed, and should start up without the need for a reboot *** Think of one of the cards shown to you and tap the screen. Your phone will make your thought of card DISAPPEAR! A simple yet very effective magic trick.  After you have done it to yourself, show your friends.  Remember, don't show it multiple times in a row, or it you will lose the effect! They will be amazed at how smart your smartphone is! Bet your friends at a bar that your phone can make their thought of card disappear. It's a nice way to get a few free drinks! Works 100% of the time!!
